pkgmetadata.longdescription: Genotype-by-Environment Interaction in Polygenic Score Models // A novel PRS model is introduced to enhance the prediction accuracy by utilising GxE effects. This package performs Genome Wide Association Studies (GWAS) and Genome Wide Environment Interaction Studies (GWEIS) using a discovery dataset. The package has the ability to obtain polygenic risk scores (PRSs) for a target sample. Finally it predicts the risk values of each individual in the target sample. Users have the choice of using existing models (Li et al., 2015) doi:10.1093/annonc/mdu565, (Pandis et al., 2013) doi:10.1093/ejo/cjt054, (Peyrot et al., 2018) doi:10.1016/j.biopsych.2017.09.009 and (Song et al., 2022) doi:10.1038/s41467-022-32407-9, as well as newly proposed models for genomic risk prediction (refer to the URL for more details).
